statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={5.3} , \displaystyle{b}={8.5}, \displaystyle{c}={10.6}, and \displaystyle{d}={11.3}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={10.4}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
